Module org.cybergarage.upnp

Package org.cybergarage.upnp

package org.cybergarage.upnp
Provides classes and interfaces for UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) functionality. This package includes classes for managing UPnP devices, services, actions, and state variables.

The main classes in this package are:

  • Device - Represents a UPnP device.
  • Service - Represents a UPnP service.
  • Action - Represents a UPnP action.
  • StateVariable - Represents a UPnP state variable.
  • Class
    Description
    Action
    Represents a UPnP action that can be invoked on a service.
    ActionList
    A list of Action objects.
    AllowedValue
    Represents a single allowed value for a UPnP state variable.
    AllowedValueList
    A list of AllowedValue objects for a state variable.
    AllowedValueRange
    Represents an allowed value range for a UPnP state variable.
    Argument
    Represents an argument of a UPnP action.
    ArgumentList
    A list of Argument objects.
